secrets.name: CLERK_SECRET_KEY
secrets.description: Clerk Secret Key. Found in your Clerk Dashboard under API Keys.

secrets.name: CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY
secrets.description: Clerk Publishable Key. Found in your Clerk Dashboard under API Keys.

secrets.name: CLERK_JWT_TEMPLATE
secrets.description: The name of your Clerk JWT Template. The README recommends 'pan-api'.

secrets.name: STRIPE_SECRET_KEY
secrets.description: Stripe Secret Key. Found in your Stripe Dashboard under Developers > API keys.

secrets.name: STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET
secrets.description: Stripe Webhook Signing Secret. Generated when you create a webhook endpoint.

secrets.name: STRIPE_PRICE_ID
secrets.description: The Stripe Price ID for your 'Pro' plan (e.g., price_...).

secrets.name: STRIPE_PORTAL_CONFIG_ID
secrets.description: The Stripe Customer Portal Configuration ID (e.g., bpc_...).

secrets.name: VITE_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY
secrets.description: Clerk Publishable Key (this is the same key as before).

secrets.name: VITE_API_URL
secrets.description: The URL of your deployed API worker. For local dev, this is http://localhost:8787.
